Sender is commenting on financial information about Donald Trump

analysis.significance: Shows communication about media coverage of political figures and financial matters

details: Reference to New York Times article about Donald Trump's finances

analysis.summary: An email from 'J' to Alan Dershowitz criticizing a New York Times article about Donald Trump's childhood earnings, questioning the financial methodology used in the reporting and calling the journalists 'financial illiterates'.
